Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: UMvelinqangi wenu uMvelinqangi oyedwa vo ngakho- ke labo abangakholelwa empilweni ezayo izinhliziyo zabo ziyakwenqaba (lokho) futhi bona bayazigabisa
Akungabazeki ukuthi uMvelinqangi uyakwazi lokho abakufihlayo kanye nalokho abakuvezayo ngempela yena akabathandi abazigabisayo
Futhi uma (bebuzwa) kuthiwa kubona yini eyembulwa iNkosi yena na? bathi, “izinganekwane zabantu basendulo”
Ukuze bakwazi ukuthwala imithwalo yabo yonke ngelanga lokuvuka kwabafileyo kanye nemithwalo yalabo ababadukisa ngaphandle kolwazi ngokungangabazeki kubi lokho abayokuthwala
